## Reading in the Data

```{r}
#reading in packages I will probably use
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

#reading multiple files of data into R and combing them into one dataframe
dfLyrics <-
  list.files(path = ".", pattern = "*.csv") |>
  map_df(\(x) read_csv(x, header = TRUE))
         
         
         
print(dfLyrics)
```
